name: Provisions of depository contracts
text: §38-4  Provisions of depository contracts.  Any acceptance by a depository of treasury moneys shall constitute an acceptance of the provisions of sections 38-2 and 38-3, and those provisions shall be deemed a part of and incorporated into the contract of deposit without any necessity for specific mention thereof.  The director shall file with the comptroller a copy of any formal written contract of deposit which may be entered into. [L 1970, c 51, pt of §1]
